Actions.Name: Knee in the Back
Actions.Effect: Critical hit if made from stealth (+[D]).

Actions.Name: Blackjack
Actions.Description: An adjacent foe is slowed. If made from stealth, this action also deals [fray] damage.

Actions.Name: Wild Gamble
Actions.Description: Roll 1d6. Dash exactly that many spaces in a straight line, or as far as possible, then deal damage equal to the spaces moved, twice, to an adjacent foe. If no foes are adjacent, deal no damage.
